rows.name:
Great flock of herbivores appear in
Gula, but unusually aggressive!
Stop it before Torigo come to harm!

Torigo fields ravaged by bugs.
Clear out pests before townsfolk
tummies go growly-growly!

Imperials mostly small fry, get forgotten
easily. But these ones not done! Friends
think friends can take them?

In any world, vermin flock to pretty
things, meh. Friends please to defeat
quick, or numbers continue to grow!

Flying monsters darken skies...
But if friends swat them to ground,
me think battle can be won!

Tirkin venerate totem like it holy tree.
Goal is to destroy totem with extreme
prejudice, as worshipers will gather!

In this challenge, point is to use head.
That is easy task for Nopon Archsage,
but how will friends fare, hm?

Me see many times before, but end of
civilization is sad sight always. Time to
put mutated lifeforms out of misery.

Aligo appear at Iyasaki sunning-beach!
You must return peace to proceedings.
Me hear red Aligo all a bit naughty...

Is true reenactment of hit video game
Tiger! Tiger!. Very rare event! Tora, go!
Is your time to shine!

Is special course, made possible by
Archsage powers. Relive fierce contest
against Iira Drivers! Exciting, yes?

This challenge require power honed to
very extreme! Very serious business!
Archsage can't wait to watch!

Dinosaur big, dinosaur strong! More
dinosaur, more-more strong! ...But tiny
ones that buff may be biggest danger...

Three tribes of Tirkin, Igna, and Garlus
join forces to fight against you, friends!
Whose bond will prove stronger, hm?

Letter of challenge arrive from monster!
Chickenheart Dagmara come fight with
allies in tow. Hope friends up to task!

Friends have incurred wrath of Cloud
Sea King! So much wrath, king look all
red now. Time to put Ken to bed!

Territorial Rotbart and Immovable
Gonzalez are famous Gogol veterans,
but now is birth of new Gogol legend!

Technology of ancient people create
new weapon, but weapon continue to
grow without old masters! Ready for it?

Way of warrior is always pursue power.
Countless folks follow that path, but
today friends face strongest of them all!

9th Armored Division is toughest in all
Empire! Also, now they use forbidden
technology. Is thrilling fight ahead!

This challenge is special score attack!
Have to not just defeat enemies, but
defeat in way that give more points!

In this challenge, have to raise Aspar!
Not kill, but not let live... Is complicated
kind of Aspar fight, meh.

Shin is man who destroy Divine Beast battleship
single-handedly. Through Archsage
powers, friends can experience too!

Finally time for main event! This year's
festival of select Heropon of the Nopon.
Most unique contest await Tora!

Mighty warrior arrive from whole
different planet! Friends have to
rise to challenge and fight for Alst!

Nopon Archsage hope friends can let
Elma incident be water under bridge,
enjoy fight again like innocent fun it is!

When poison monster appear, spring in
Liberalitas become fetid bog. But with
special combat gear, poison not scary!

Challenge available from chapter 6.
Requires the "Nopon Summons, Pt. 2"
key item.

Challenge available after completing
main story.

Challenge available after completing
stage 5 in Tiger! Tiger!.

Challenge available after defeating
certain Unique Monster.

Rex, Nia, Tora, Meleph, Zeke,
Homura, Byakko, Hana JS, Kagutsuchi,
Saika, Shulk and Fiorung required.
Specified Blades must be engaged.
